page.title: 08SHOPPING IN IDRIDGEHAY
page.content: In the village there is only one shop. It sells basic foods househoid requirements ,sweets, drinks, cigarettes and petrol it is also a post office.Other traders come round the village in vans. THESE INCLUDE: The milkman - three times a week. The vegetable man - thrice weekly. The butcher comes twice a week. The baker once a week. The postman every day except sundays. The newspaper man every day. The library van comes once a week. Most people go shopping in other towns.Ten families go to Derby, three families go to Belper, four go to Wirksworth, One goes to Matlock, and three go to Ripley.
